title: My PC turned on after a long period of not turning on. What should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Assuming its been like 6 months or 1 entire year, get it open, dust off everything, clean ram/gpu any other hardware connected to the motherboard, check all the connections in case something as loose off a bit, and most important put some new thermal paste on the CPU, get it back on again, check time/date on bios (hope your configuration is still saved, if not maybe you’ll need to replace the CR2035 battery on the board) boot your OS get the latest updates and you should be good to go, maybe you dont need any of this but this was the procedure I followed myself after 2 years of not using my precious PC :) Hope I helped you out buddy.
